name: medialister-marketplace-helper
title: Medialister Marketplace Helper
description: Medialister is a marketplace where brands can buy advertorial placements in the variety of online media. The extension can help to set up proper filters and sortig options for a particular goal.
author: timsedov

commands.name: search-medialister
commands.title: Search Medialister
commands.subtitle: Medialister Helper
commands.description: Search for online media in the Medialister marketplace

commands.name: search-formats
commands.title: Check Media for Placement Options
commands.subtitle: Medialister Helper
commands.description: Booking options for a selected media

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
